sentences.cn: 干什么专什么,简单事不简单.

sentences.en: Enterprise Spirit : United , devotional, and loving XX as our won families.
sentences.cn: 企业精神--------上下同心,全力以赴, 爱我XX,企业如家.

sentences.en: His work crosses the boundaries of philosophy, theology, psychology, literary criticism, devotional literature and fiction.
sentences.cn: 他的作品跨越哲学 、 神学 、 心理学 、 文学批评 、 信仰文学和小说等学科领域.

sentences.en: I also learned to have daily devotional time that includes praying and reading the bible.
sentences.cn: 而且,我也学会了每日灵修:祷告+读经.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages reliquaries, or devotional pendants, and crosses were created with jewels.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪,圣物匣或祈祷用的悬饰以及十字架被装上珠宝.

sentences.en: In voting process, leader cadres all over the face devotional.
sentences.cn: 投票过程中, 领导干部们满脸的虔诚.

sentences.en: Kirtan would be arranged and they would spend hours in dance and devotional music.
sentences.cn: 他们会安排唱颂圣名,花数小时去载歌载舞.

sentences.en: On biblical prophetic grounds they sought simplicity in the cognitive, moral, and devotional life of Christianity.
sentences.cn: 在圣经预言的范围里,他们简单地寻求认知基督教上的道德和虔诚生活.

sentences.en: The devotional cults further weakened Buddhism, which had long been on the decline.
sentences.cn: 虔诚的祭礼进一步地弱化长期以来衰落的佛教.

sentences.en: The religious tradition of Massachusetts bred its brand of devotional literature.
sentences.cn: 马萨诸塞州的宗教传统孕育出了具有宗教特征的献身文学.

sentences.en: The truth includes our devotional Marxism, include the people understanding to the regularity of external object.
sentences.cn: 真理包括我们信仰的马克思主义, 包括人们对客观事物的规律性的认识.

sentences.en: We have a bilingual devotional that we would like to give to you.
sentences.cn: 我们有一本中英对照的每日灵修小册子要送给你.

sentences.en: Willing to take responsibility . Be devotional. Good ability in personal communications, cooperation and team work.
sentences.cn: 有责任心 、 工作投入. 有团队精神,善于合作和沟通.

sentences.en: Work View : Devotional and considerate in working.
sentences.cn: 工作观----------干什么专什么,简单事不简单.

words.tran_cn: 献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）
虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的

trans.tran_cn: 专心的，献身的，信仰的，虔诚的
